Yuma.Yuma Union High School:
Yuma High School (often referred to simply as Yuma High) is the oldest high school in Yuma, Arizona.


== History ==
The school was established in 1909, when Arizona Territory taxpayers voted to organize a union district from several elementary districts. In September of that year, Yuma Union High School began with four teachers in three rooms near the corner of Main and Third Streets.
